thread.title: Katy Perry Is Launching a Mermaid-Inspired Makeup Line
thread.title_full: Katy Perry Is Launching a Mermaid-Inspired Makeup Line

title: Katy Perry Is Launching a Mermaid-Inspired Makeup Line
text: Feb 19, 2017 Katy Perry has new music, a new look, and soon, a new makeup line. The CoverGirl spokeswoman is launching a new collaboration with the beauty brand, PopSugar reports , and will be entirely mermaid themed. Cue the cheers of beach goddesses everywhere. The capsule will feature four new eyeliners, four lipsticks, and two eye shadow/highlighter duos in colors ranging from "peachy Apricat to a Bluetiful lip, shimmery highlighters in rose and gold, and a pop of Whispurr white or Purmaid green to line your eyes." Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A post shared by KATY PERRY (@katyperry) on Dec 1, 2015 at 8:01am PST Most Popular "In the next evolution of my Katy Kat line with CoverGirl, I was inspired by Spring's upcoming mermaid and pearlescent hues," Perry told PopSugar. "You'll make Ariel jealous, and look better than a shimmering Easter basket when you're done." A post shared by KATY PERRY (@katyperry) on Feb 6, 2017 at 6:52pm PST The oceanic-inspired products will drop just in time for warmer weather and trips to the seaâ€”hitting covergirl.com in early March and in stores in April.
